query: how to purify water with household bleach
passage: Use unscented household bleach (5–8.25% sodium hypochlorite). Add 2 drops per liter (8 drops per gallon), stir, wait 30 minutes. Water should have a slight chlorine smell; if not, repeat and wait 15 minutes.
